methodology.title: Methodology
methodology.content: Risk factors are extracted from the risk_factors column on each contract. Co-occurrence lift is calculated as P(A and B) / (P(A) * P(B)), where a lift of 1.0 means factors co-occur exactly as often as expected by chance. Values above 2.0 indicate a strong non-random association that may suggest coordinated procurement irregularities.
